data.title: I Saw The Light
data.text:
We’ve got our hands on three new preview clips of I Saw the Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie directed by Marc Abraham and starring Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen:

I Saw the Light – Hurtful thing to say

I Saw the Light – Somewhere else.

I Saw the Light – HollywoodPlot synopsis:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams (Tom Hiddleston), who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

What do you think of British Actor Tom Hiddleston’s performance as as an American country singer?

The film is set to hit theaters on March 25, 2016.

:)

There’s some pillow talk in this new preview clip of I Saw The Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie starring Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen:

I Saw The Light – You love me.Plot synopsis:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams (Tom Hiddleston), who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

Actress Elizabeth Olsen is a gorgeous woman, isn’t she? There’s so much chemistry between her and Tom Hiddleston in this scene that one could think they’re dating each other in real life.

The film will be released in theaters on March 25, 2016.

:)

I’ve just spotted this new preview clip of I Saw The Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie starring Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen:

I Saw the Light – Honkey TonkinPlot synopsis:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams (Tom Hiddleston), who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

Tom Hiddleston is singing like a pro, one can but love him!

The film is directed by Marc Abraham.

Release date: March 25, 2016.

:)

There’s a new international trailer for I Saw the Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie directed by Marc Abraham and starring Tom Hiddleston:

I SAW THE LIGHTPlot synopsis:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams (Tom Hiddleston), who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

Tom Hiddleston is not only a great actor but he is also a talented singer: one can but be impressed!

Release date: March 25, 2016.

:)

Take a look to the first official poster of I Saw The Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie directed by Marc Abraham and starring Tom Hiddleston and Elizabeth Olsen:

(Click on the poster to enlarge.)

I SAW THE LIGHT

Plot synopsis:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams (Tom Hiddleston), who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

Actor Tom Hiddleston really looks the part as a country singer!

Here’s the movie trailer of I Saw The Light if you haven’t seen it yet: Continue reading »

You may watch below the first official trailer of I Saw The Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie directed by Marc Abraham and starring Tom Hiddleston, Elizabeth Olsen, Bradley Whitford, Cherry Jones, Maddie Hasson, Wrenn Schmidt, and David Krumholtz:

I SAW THE LIGHTPlot synopsis:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

Loki (Tom Hiddleston) and Scarlet Witch (Elizabeth Olsen) in a movie about country music!, you sure don’t want to miss that! Besides, Loki sings like a bird!

The film will be released on March 25, 2016.

:)

Take a look to this new series of pictures of I Saw The Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie directed by Marc Abraham and starring Tom Hiddleston:

(Click on a picture to enlarge.) Plot:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

Love the white cowboy suit!

Besides Tom Hiddleston, the cast also includes Elizabeth Olsen, Cherry Jones, Bradley Whitford, Maddie Hasson, Wren Schmidt, and David Krumholtz.

The release date of I Saw The Light has been pushed back to March 25, 2016.

:)

We’ve got our hands on a first preview clip of I Saw The Light, the upcoming musical biography drama movie directed by Marc Abraham and starring Tom Hiddleston, Elizabeth Olsen, Cherry Jones, Bradley Whitford, Maddie Hasson, Wren Schmidt, and David Krumholtz:

I Saw The Light – Hanks Williams (Tom Hiddleston) is recording a song. Plot:

“The story of the legendary country western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his meteoric rise to fame and its ultimately tragic effect on his health and personal life.”

Tom Hiddleston is perfoming the songs from the film himself! Loki is a really talented man, isn’t he?

Anyway, a few pictures from the film:

(Click on a picture to enlarge.)

The release date fo I Saw The Light is set to November 27, 2015.

:)
